updates.title: Research on Hate and Foul Language Detection
updates.content: Developed a robust detection system using scikit-learn with thorough data preprocessing. Executed advanced techniques including tokenization, stopword removal, lemmatization, and special character elimination. Collaborated with Prof. Satyananda Champati Rai, co-authoring a research paper achieving 96% accuracy.

updates.title: Mathematical Problem Solving using LLM Reasoning and Genetic Algorithm
updates.content: Working under Prof. Satyananda Champati Rai on applying reasoning capabilities of Large Language Models (LLMs) to solve complex mathematical problems. Implementing Genetic Algorithms to optimize solutions and enhance model efficiency. Researching techniques to integrate logical reasoning with evolutionary computation for improved accuracy.
